pageTitle: 48 CFR Part 4, Subpart 4.14 - Reporting Executive Compensation and First-Tier Subcontract Awards | LII / Legal Information Institute
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {32776=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to implement a section of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) for Fiscal Year (FY) 2013 to include in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System (FAPIIS), to the extent practicable, identification of any immediate owner or subsidiary, and all predecessors of an offeror that held a Federal contract or grant within the last three years. The objective is to provide a more comprehensive understanding of the performance and integrity of the corporation before awarding a Federal contract., 25048=§ 2322 - Repealed., 24157=§ 2314 - Laws inapplicable to agencies named in, 24640=§ 2318 - Advocates for competition, 27083=§ 2336 - Intergovernmental support agreements with State and local governments, 26431=§ 2331 - Procurement of services: contracts for professional and technical services, 26846=§ 2334 - Independent cost estimation and cost analysis, 24453=§ 2316 - Disclosure of identity of contractor, 25128=§ 2323 - Contract goal for small disadvantaged businesses and certain institutions of higher education, 9019=DoD, GSA, and NASA are issuing a correction to FAR Case 2012-023; Uniform Procurement Identification (Item III), which was published in the Federal Register at 79 FR 61739, October 14, 2014., 23491=§ 2309 - Allocation of appropriations, 25514=§ 2324 - Allowable costs under defense contracts, 24839=§ 2320 - Rights in technical data, 26962=§ 2335 - Prohibition on collection of political information, 38240=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to further implement the inflation adjustment of acquisition-related dollar thresholds. A statute requires an adjustment every five years of acquisition-related thresholds for inflation using the Consumer Price Index for all urban consumers, except for the Construction Wage Rate Requirements statute (Davis-Bacon Act), Service Contract Labor Standards statute, and trade agreements thresholds. DoD, GSA, and NASA are also proposing to use the same methodology to adjust nonstatutory FAR acquisition-related thresholds in 2015., 23933=§ 2313 - Examination of records of contractor, 25624=§ 2325 - Restructuring costs, 23590=§ 2310 - Determinations and decisions, 24266=§ 2315 - Law inapplicable to the procurement of automatic data processing equipment and services for certain defense purposes, 23384=§ 2308 - Buy-to-budget acquisition: end items, 21027=§ 2301 - Repealed., 27223=§ 2337 - Life-cycle management and product support, 23295=§ 2307 - Contract financing, 26576=§ 2332 - Share-in-savings contracts, 26673=§ 2333 - Joint policies on requirements definition, contingency program management, and contingency contracting, 22612=§ 2305 - Contracts: planning, solicitation, evaluation, and award procedures, 26187=§ 2330 - Procurement of contract services: management structure, 25832=§ 2327 - Contracts: consideration of national security objectives, 26107=§ 2329 - Repealed., 22856=§ 2306 - Kinds of contracts, 24736=§ 2319 - Encouragement of new competitors, 21833=§ 2304 - Contracts: competition requirements, 24934=§ 2321 - Validation of proprietary data restrictions, 24560=§ 2317 - Repealed., 21107=§ 2302 - Definitions, 23831=§ 2312 - Remission of liquidated damages, 25714=§ 2326 - Undefinitized contractual actions: restrictions, 23689=§ 2311 - Assignment and delegation of procurement functions and responsibilities, 25959=§ 2328 - Release of technical data under Freedom of Information Act: recovery of costs, 21656=§ 2303 - Applicability of chapter}

textAfterTable: DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE, GENERAL SERVICES ADMINISTRATION, NATIONAL AERONAUTICS AND SPACE ADMINISTRATION Final rule. Effective: December 26, 2014. 48 CFR Parts 4, 14, 15, and 52 Summary DoD, GSA, and NASA are issuing a final rule amending the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to standardize the incorporation by reference of representations and certifications in contracts. 2014-10-24; vol. 79 # 206 - Friday, October 24, 2014 79 FR 63562 - Federal Acquisition Regulation; Uniform Procurement Identification; Correction GPO FDSys XML | Text Additional Documents type regulations.gov FR Doc. 2014-25416 RIN 9000-AM60 Correction FAR Case 2012-023 FAC 2005-77 Docket No. 2012-0023, Sequence 1
